        <div class="grid-container" id="main-content">
                            <div class="grid-x grid-margin-x">
    <div class="small-12 medium-12 large-9 cell">

</div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-6"><likes-rating :perfume_id="84095" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></likes-rating></div><div class="cell small-6"><seasons-rating :perfume_id="84095" chart="show" type-chart="small-chart" colors="retro"></seasons-rating></div><div class="small-12 medium-6 text-center" style="max-height: 50px"><div itemprop="aggregateRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/AggregateRating" itemscope><p class="info-note">Perfume rating&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingValue">4.05</span>&nbsp;out of&nbsp;<span itemprop="bestRating">5</span> with&nbsp;<span itemprop="ratingCount" content="643">643</span> votes<meta itemprop="reviewCount" content="169"/></p></div></div></div><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell small-12" itemprop="description" v-pre><p><b>Sweet Tooth Caramel Dream</b> by <b>Sabrina Carpenter</b> is a Oriental Vanilla fragrance for women. This is a new fragrance. <b>Sweet Tooth Caramel Dream</b> was launched in 2023. The nose behind this fragrance is Gil Clavien. Top notes are Sugar, Almond Milk, Orange, Freesia and Lemon; middle notes are Dark Chocolate, Vanilla, Orchid and Orange Blossom; base notes are Caramel, Patchouli, Musk, Amber and Sandalwood. </p><div v-pre class='fragrantica-blockquote'><p>TOP: Sugared Lemon, Orange Zest, Almond Milk, Freesia<br />
HEART: Orange Blossom, Tiger Orchid, Dark Chocolate Bean, Vanilla<br />
BASE: Sandalwood, Caramelized Oriental, Patchouli, Fluffy, Musk</p></div><p class="reviewstrigger" style="font-size: smaller; color: #83a6c4">Read about this perfume in other languages: <a </pyramid-level><h4 style="margin-top: 0.5rem"><b>Base Notes</b></h4><pyramid-level notes="base"><div style="display: flex; justify-content: center; text-align: center; flex-wrap: wrap; align-items: flex-end; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.85008085084786; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.54.jpg" style="width: 3.025rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Amber-54.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Amber</div></div><div style="margin: 0.2rem; display: flex; justify-content: center; flex-direction: column; text-align: center; opacity: 0.84529946162075; position: relative;"><div><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/sastojci/t.33.jpg" style="width: 3rem;"></div><div><a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/notes/Sandalwood-33.html"><span class="link-span"></span></a>Sandalwood</div></div></div>
</pyramid-level></pyramid-switch></div></div><div class="cell text-center"><button class="button small" data-open="NotesRatingModal">Vote for Ingredients</button></div></div><notes-rating :perfume_id="84095"></notes-rating></div><div class="cell small-12"><vue-encrypt-postscribe slotid='71424b716f8b9d9c0cb0e2e77ea0fb89378' slotpayload='{"ct":"98UGthicjZoFCGcBoIu2KqUI8bafhTmAGUV1nOR64QiO1S144QYzM159lDW72ZI2gLpKe6I98+zsBQeracRiwkYKwRZwieuIM3oNCa6S\/QsaIY\/Mld0Dup7s5spSYZeEkps2Y9JlJeSG6QOYBOlbQS5\/TM6o\/J2diPP9aVGzzFfjcBydUFN+EstmeduzKxapBflu9dNXGTKJgGXsNbAZ2qGXhe8B682CP8QmfHcYfYc0R70OCpd3wH5xs1S4a2dNKXCxtG+c2lT66XkT7whKkOSzSqSeAhru4oLxypm4nhyeXYM1YgP4a7IRc2R+TGeBU9SCyxh3c894tYPAGyqMFA==","iv":"3d065502dd30b5ce4d8e9444e4b0d872","s":"672ecfed3474d260"}'></vue-encrypt-postscribe></div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-padding-y"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3 -->
<div class="freeStarFragrantica" align="center" data-freestar-ad="__300x300 __728x90" id="fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_3" v-pre>
</div><div class="cell small-12"><div class="strike-title"><span>Designer Sabrina Carpenter</span></div><div class="carousel"><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.76824.jpg"alt="Sweet Tooth Sabrina Carpenter" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Sabrina Carpenter</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Sweet Tooth</span></a></div><div class="carousel-cell"><a href="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/s.95861.jpg"alt="Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby Sabrina Carpenter" width="125" height="140"><span class="brand">Sabrina Carpenter</span><br><span class="ztworowseclipse">Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby</span></a></div></div><carousel-perfumes></carousel-perfumes></div><div class="cell"><div class="grid-x grid-margin-x grid-margin-y"><div class="cell"><div class="strike-title"><span>Sweet Tooth Caramel Dream News</span></div></div><div class="newslist cell small-12 large-6">
    <img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/news/en/18793/news.18793-120x120.jpg" alt="Sabrina Carpenter and Scent Beauty Launch Sweet Tooth Caramel Dream" style="margin-right: 1em; flex-shrink: 0">    <div class="flex-child-auto">
        <a href="https://www.fragrantica.com/news/Sabrina-Carpenter-and-Scent-Beauty-launch-Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-18793.html">
            <span class="clickcatcher"></span><h4>Sabrina Carpenter and Scent Beauty Launch Sweet Tooth Caramel Dream</h4>
        </a>
        <p>by <i>Elena Knezevic</i></p>
        <div class="right-bottom-corner-abs">            08/22/23 13:10
                    </div>
    </div>

    <span class="badge">22</span>
</div>
</div></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><longevity-rating :perfume_id="84095"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume longevity:<span>2.60</span> out of<span>5</span>.</p></longevity-rating></div><div class="cell small-12 medium-6" style="padding: 2rem 1.5rem 0 1.5rem;"><sillage-rating :perfume_id="84095"><p style="color: #83a6c4;">Perfume sillage:<span>1.74</span> out of<span>4</span>.</p></sillage-rating></div><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_4 -->

    <div class="strike-title"><span>All Reviews By Date</span></div>
    <div class="grid-x grid-padding-x grid-margin-y" style="position: relative; padding: 0 0.25rem 0 0.25rem;">
        <div class="cell destinationreview"></div>                    <div id="parent2352837" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2352837" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="PINKCAT17"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2115056"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2115056.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="PINKCAT17" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Nemat-International/Musk-Amber-43542.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.43542.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Musk Amber"title="Musk Amber"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2352837ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2352837" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2115056">PINKCAT17</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-18"></span><fromunixtime unixtime="1731934912" class="vote-button-legend"></fromunixtime></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So I own the pink sweet tooth and I decided to test out the caramel dream to see if there were any key differences and if it was gonna be redundant to buy two and this are the differences <br />
1 . Spicier in the beginning and definitely not as gourmand as the pink one<br />
2. This is more of a fall cozy scent slighty smelling like cocoa butter or Choco musk<br />
Sweet tooth is more vanilla and coconutty<br />
3. After wearing it for 4 hours it's definitely toned down a little and smells more of spicy caramel <br />
Total thoughts - it's good but you could get better you can't really go wrong with this type of scent but if you have Eilish, Chocomusk , [ The Smore perfume from Walmart ] its kind of the same thing but that's my personal opinion <br />
Rating 8/10</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2352837"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2352837#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2348095" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2348095" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TheDecantingWitch"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2072984"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2072984.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TheDecantingWitch" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2348095ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2348095" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); I was excited for this one because of the notes and reviews. It reminds me of warm vanilla sugar from BBW. (Which I do love btw) but I wasn't expecting such a one note scent. <br />
<br />
Oh well...this is regulated to purse perfume now.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2348095"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2348095#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346837" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346837" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="infble"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2313736"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2313736.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="infble" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346837ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346837" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2313736">infble</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 15:40</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I love this one! I find myself going back to it the most out of the three. Its fairly similar to the original Sweet Tooth but I definitely get the caramel and light citrus notes as it dries down. Its also the most balanced out of the three which is probably why I enjoy it so much. I feel like at times it leans even a bit masculine and isnt sickly and sticky like some other caramel scents Ive tried. I cant wait to purchase the full bottle soon.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2346837"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2346837#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2346678" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2346678" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="hellsgemini"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314674"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2314674.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="hellsgemini" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2346678ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2346678" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2314674">hellsgemini</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-12">11/12/24 13:34</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Very similar to the original Sweet Tooth. I have to agree with a lot of other users, it is nothing special. The caramel note seems to be missing entirely and the only thing setting it apart from the original is the sandalwood note at the base (at least for me). I will use it, but I doubt I will be repurchasing.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2346678"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2346678#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2345744" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2345744" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="m0userella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814300"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1814300.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="m0userella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2345744ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2345744" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.72); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1814300">m0userella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-11">11/11/24 16:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells 90% like the OG Sweet Tooth to me except this one is stronger and sweeter. The OG can sometimes be too light for my nose to even pick up but the few times I've actually been able to smell it its been amazing. This one is better to me just because I can actually smell it. I wish Sabrina would work on the performance of her scents bc they're heavenly just kinda weak.<br />
<br />
Caramel, vanilla and whipped cream are very common notes in perfumes but I've never smelled anything like this. Even the vanilla scents from BBW or Victoria's Secret. Their vanillas are very artificial and smell too much like jelly beans and saliva tbh. This always gets compared to Warm Vanilla Sugar by BBW but that one smells so disgusting to me and I'm a vanilla lover. Sabrina's vanilla is soooo different from the rest to me. Way creamier and more realistic.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2345744"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2345744#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0; border: none; margin: 0;"><!-- Tag ID: fragranticacom_perfume_incontent_6 -->

padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2345640" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="venus as a girl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2310540"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2310540.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="venus as a girl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2345640ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2345640" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2310540">venus as a girl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-11">11/11/24 14:30</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i was so hoping to love this one because i adore sabrina and the original sweet tooth was a bit too sweet and feminine for me, but unfortunately this is not it. ive never smelled patchouli before but if thats what makes this overpoweringly almost minty i have to join the patchouli hate train, though i do believe it was used well its still nauseating. i dont smell the caramel on my skin at all but i do get a bit of the chocolate though its like cheap european chocolate, reminds me of chocolate rocks. maybe this scent just isnt for my skin? all the notes i was excited for i dont get at all, no citrus no caramel no almond milk, but of course i get vanilla.. maybe ill try it out again another time</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2343874" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="TANGYMERGS"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2265829"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2265829.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="TANGYMERGS" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2343874ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2343874" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2265829">TANGYMERGS</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-11-09">11/09/24 22:11</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Honestly, if this girl's music career doesn't work out, let her keep making perfumes. With this and the OG Sweet Tooth, shes 2 for 2 for me! Ironically, this doesn't really give me a caramel scent, so I could see why someone would be disappointed (I have learned I don't particularly like scents that smell "sticky" so it kinda works out in my favor.) Instead I get this light, slightly musky, creamy cloud of vanilla and chocolate swirl. Kinda surprised me how much I loved this, I just saw it in Rite Aid and gave it a shot. So thank you Rite Aid for your services!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2343874"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2343874#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2341688" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Not very caramel. <br />
Nice, but very weak. Would make a good kids perfume</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2341688"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2341688#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2336421" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2336421" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Siv7Stars"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/47621"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.47621.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Siv7Stars" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Jovoy-Paris/Fire-At-Will-70289.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.70289.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Fire At Will"title="Fire At Will"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2336421ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2336421" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73); I got nothing but caramel so it didnt disappoint on that score.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2336421"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2336421#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2335750" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2279550">magnoliarelena</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-29">10/29/24 19:59</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I stan Sabrina but this is like stripper perfume. Blind buy based off notes. It smells like Eilish (basically identical) to me, or honestly any vanilla Bodycology spray from Walmart. Similar to Sol de Janeiro scents, as well. It's not my fave and I won't rebuy. The almond, marshmallow, chocolate, caramel, and vanilla come through the most. I was super excited about the "sugared lemon" but I haven't really found any trace of that. It's like a 6/10 for me. I prefer Sol de Janiero. But when I wear this, I feel like Sabrina!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2332033"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2332033#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2329003" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2329003" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scheherazade_x"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213492"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2213492.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scheherazade_x" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Dior/Dior-Homme-Original-69010.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.69010.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Dior Homme Original"title="Dior Homme Original"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2329003ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2329003" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2213492">Scheherazade_x</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-27">10/27/24 03:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>A little bit of sugar and almond, a hint of white floral. Lots of chocolate, vanilla, and caramel. Musk.<br />
<br />
For the price, Im really pleased with this one. Its sweet, girly, verging on gourmand, and cosy enough to make a good everyday autumn scent. I would absolutely add a full bottle to my collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2329003"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2329003#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2323114" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2323114" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Wee keavo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2114814"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2114814.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Wee keavo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Stephane-Humbert-Lucas-777/Venom-Incarnat-72387.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72387.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Venom Incarnat"title="Venom Incarnat"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2323114ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2323114" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2114814">Wee keavo</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-21">10/21/24 15:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Just smells like an iced caramel frappe.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2323114"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2323114#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321893" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2321893" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="misxag"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720852"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1720852.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="misxag" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sol-de-Janeiro/Cheirosa-59-88722.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88722.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cheirosa '59"title="Cheirosa '59"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2321893ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2321893" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1720852">misxag</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-20">10/20/24 10:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Okay, listen, i cant compare it to the OG one, since I didnt smell it, but hey i also have some other thoughts about it:) <br />
<br />
I blind bought Caramel Dream, and honestly was slightly sad, since I wanted the pinkish one. Firstly, for me it is pretty floral/citrusy with a mix of dark chocolate, but the chocolate is blended pretty well, so I dont pay attention to it (Im allergic). Definitely can smell some vanilla, but not so much of a caramel. The dry down isnt so citrusy or floral, just good old vanilla+caramel+etc. <br />
<br />
So here is my fav part: I didnt see reviews of people talking about it, but the dry down is literally OG Eilish by Billie Eilish. I really love that fragrance, so I was kinda surprised in a good way ofc. Partially, I bought Caramel Dream for this, since here on fragrantica OG Eilish is listed as similar perfumes, but it is soooo identical i cant!!!<br />
<br />
The performance of it isnt so exciting comparing to other perfumes that I have. I wore it right after I bought, and after 4 hours passed I couldnt smell it on my wrist at all. Imo is not such a nice thing: my Ari by Ariana Grande lasted around 3-4 days after I sprayed it on my clothes (maybe it is a difference, but I couldnt smell caramel dream on my t-shirt) when is comes to the sillage idk what it was, but I think it was normal.<br />
<br />
Overall, I give this fragrance 7/10. I dont really enjoy the opening, but the dry down is sooo good </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2321893"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2321893#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2321495" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2321495" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="jocesomesauce"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2050061"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2050061.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="jocesomesauce" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2321495ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2321495" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2050061">jocesomesauce</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-20">10/20/24 01:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>crushed and devastated and heartbroken. i liked sweet tooth and everyone told me i was going to love this one. they hyped it up. i was hyped. however. it smells EXACTLY like the marshmallow fireside room spray i had from bath and bodyworks in 2020. theres nothing wrong with it (maybe a little cloying) but it gives me NAUSEOUS FLASHBACKS TO THE PANDEMIC xP</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2321495"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2321495#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2317879" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2317879" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ratstyx"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1639208"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1639208.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ratstyx" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lush/Super-Milk-88991.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88991.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Super Milk"title="Super Milk"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2317879ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2317879" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.88); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1639208">ratstyx</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-16">10/16/24 13:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>the smell of musk was very overpowering at first, which truly made this feel more like a unisex perfume for me, which was a disappointment of sorts since i had expected a more gourmand and girly scent. the patchouli note also took me kind of by surprise, but i wouldnt say its too prominent, unless youre sensitive to it specifically. after a few days i was actually able to sense the chocolate note, which intertwined with the overall sweetness and muskiness, giving it the vibe of Choco Musk by Al Rehab without the prominent artificial vanilla note. overall i would say the its not the strongest fragrance - it would last around 2 hours at most for me before i need to reapply with a weak sillage. if youre looking for a sweet fragrance, there are better ones on the market, but this is an affordable option if youre looking for something not too overpowering or sickly sweet that you could wear to a fancier occasion.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2317879"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2317879#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2315869" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Smells like caramel for 30 seconds then turns to a dirty spice rack that needs a good cleaning. Gave it away.<br />
The OG was delightful. This one missed the mark.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2315869"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2315869#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2314344" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;want&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2314344" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Elix67"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1526137"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Elix67" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sol-de-Janeiro/Cheirosa-40-67527.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.67527.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Cheirosa '40"title="Cheirosa '40"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2314344ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2314344" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1526137">Elix67</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-13">10/13/24 09:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I agree with what some of the other reviewers are saying: this smells very similar to the OG Sweet Tooth but leans towards a more spicy-sweet scent rather than a pure gourmand caramel scent. Ive let this dry down for a couple of hours, and to my nose, I dont really detect any caramel notes it's more of the original chocolate/vanilla scent, but with a cozier, spicier tone. I think this would layer well and is also nice for the colder months. I wouldnt say its anything extraordinary, but for the price point, its nice. However, it's very, very similar to the original, so just be mindful of that!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2314344"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2314344#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2312526" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2312526" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Entr3_Nou5"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2030846"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2030846.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Entr3_Nou5" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2312526ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2312526" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2030846">Entr3_Nou5</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-11">10/11/24 14:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The best way I can describe this is Vera Wang - Princess if she was a 2020s tween instead of a 90s one. It pretty much eliminates all of my downsides with Princess, taking the overly sharp dark chocolate note and bringing it back down, as well as adding in the sweetness I felt it needed.<br />
<br />
Im still not OVERLY crazy about this, but for such a great price point I really cant complain.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2312526"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2312526#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2310227" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2310227" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lebronica"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874793"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1874793.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lebronica" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2310227ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2310227" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1874793">lebronica</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-09">10/09/24 12:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>For the first five minutes, nothing... Then it began to develop into a sweet, caramel-vanilla latte type of scent. For the price, I didnt expect great longevity or sillage, and thats exactly what I got. But for everyday fall wear on a budget, I love it. It does remind me of Sabrina in a good way.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2310227"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2310227#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2306908" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2306908" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="molleyisabella"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2176942"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2176942.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="molleyisabella" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2306908ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2306908" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2176942">molleyisabella</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-06">10/06/24 11:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This smells and performs like a body mist I sprayed it on me about 20 times to test the strength and projection and I can hardly smell it on myself after about 30 mins to an hour. I have fireside smores by bodycology (five dollars at Walmart) and honestly they smell so similar so I feel like this isnt even really worth having. The only difference I found between the two was that sweet tooth caramel dream has the orange/citrus note in the beginning and a creamy hint of marshmallow in the dry down.. whereas bodycologys has the toasted marshmallow. Id say theyre like 85 to 90% similar. So yeah I ended up returning it because I dont think its worth the $30 price point. If I detected any caramel in this at all, I wouldve kept it, but there is literally none. The chocolate note is minimal tooI mostly just get the Sandalwood. Honestly a let down, but at least the bottle is cute asf. I would have kept it just for the bottle but I would rather put my money towards a better perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2306908"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2306908#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2304388" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2304388" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="sassa7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/114217"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.114217.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="sassa7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Korres/Black-Sugar-63257.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.63257.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Black Sugar"title="Black Sugar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2304388ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2304388" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/114217">sassa7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-04">10/04/24 04:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Orchid amber and patchouli, yea the sweaty sexy man note combo of Iggy's Devil's Advocate. It's the orchid that makes this masculine, it is a unisex deep floral note. Top notes are fantastic, but the amber and patchouli overshadow the caramel and the top notes. Not crazy about dark chocolate as it's usually sharp. It's still better than the first one to me since that one smells like coca butter lotion to me, way too simplistic to be a perfume scent. This one at least is sophisticated.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2304388"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2304388#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2304186" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2304186" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Honeyincarnate"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273111"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2273111.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Honeyincarnate" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2304186ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2304186" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2273111">Honeyincarnate</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-03">10/03/24 22:05</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Its a lot like OG sweet tooth, a little less powdery and vanilla and more chocolate and spicy. Theres a little citrus beginning but it dries down chocolate with a bit of spice and musk. I wish it was more gourmand caramel but overall its not a bad stealth chocolate scent, cant wait to use it to balance my more super gourmand perfumes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2304186"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2304186#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2301813" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2301813" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="amethyst1221"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757728"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1757728.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="amethyst1221" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Body-Fantasies/Sweet-Sunrise-58607.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.58607.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Sunrise"title="Sweet Sunrise"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2301813ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2301813" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.73); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1757728">amethyst1221</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-10-01">10/01/24 19:33</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Almost unisex smelling, different vibe than the og. Not very sweet playful gourmand, this one is more mature. Something in it reminds me of BBW vanilla romance, its got a Smokey dark quality that that one also has.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2301813"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2301813#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2298670" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2298670" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="manameisfoxtrot"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1836638"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1836638.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="manameisfoxtrot" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2298670ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2298670" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1836638">manameisfoxtrot</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-09-29">09/29/24 02:03</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The notes of sugar and almond milk jump out upon the dry down the most. However, it can only really be smelt when your nose is pressed against whatever part of your body you sprayed it at. The floral notes of patchouli and orchid are also prominent, as well as the amber, musky, and woody notes. There are several layers to this fragrance however, the "decadent caramel" gets lost on my skin. I do not get any citrus notes- like...at all, which is okay because I am not at all a citrus lover- I love gourmand vanillas, woody and smokey smells. This is a sweet, woody, sugary smell to the likes (but not nearly as sweet) of Ariana Grande's Mod Vanilla (which lacks wood notes), just less silage and longevity. Overall, it's a good scent- perhaps overhyped on social media, but I'm not incredibly mad about it, as it could be layered with other scents to enhance the notes that are present within this one.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2298670"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2298670#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2297675" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
