padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1445367">Kitkat1820</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-25">06/25/24 13:07</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>One of my favorite fragrances, I prefer this one to the OG! I went through an entire bottle in like a week. For the same price, you can get Qissa Delicious from Paris Corner in a 3.4oz bottle compared to the 1oz STCD for $30!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2199299"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2199299#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2191677" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2191677" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Sakara7"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824115"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1824115.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Sakara7" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2191677ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2191677" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1824115">Sakara7</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-18">06/18/24 03:09</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>My sister made the comparison that this smells like vanilla royale by kayali and omg I see it for sure. Both warm spicy brown sugary vanilla fragrances with a bit of their own individuality setting them apart. I compared her claim by spraying one on each wrist!<br />
This is a nice fragrance. An elevated vanilla but its not mind blowing, I do really like it though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2191677"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2191677#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2184917" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2184917" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="maryannegrace"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311193"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1311193.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="maryannegrace" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2184917ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2184917" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1311193">maryannegrace</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-11">06/11/24 08:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Initial spray reminds me of a Lush store, not sure if there's a particular scent I tried before that reminds me of it. It has that spicy sweet scent that dominates when you first spray. Not sure what particular scent that is since I am not so good with notes.<br />
<br />
What you will be left with is basically a chocolatier, spicier version of the original Sweet Tooth. I would say the lingering scent is 60% original Sweet Tooth; 20% chocolate-caramel; 10% is probably the rest of the citrus or patchouli (idk exactly how patchouli smells). However, if you just smell the nozzle (after having sprayed it multiple times) and you get the drydown, it is 90% similar to the original Sweet Tooth. <br />
<br />
And no, the Eilish no 1 perfume does NOT smell like Caramel Dream. Eilish is more vanilla and this one is I would say a spicy caramel. It also does not smell like Vanilla Mocha Cream from BBW (far from it, if you ask me).<br />
<br />
I've had it for 2 days now and I would say I still prefer the original one. The original Sweet Tooth is perfection. I am on my 2nd bottle and kept a 75 ml bottle as a back-up. Keeping my fingers crossed that this will not be discontinued.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2184917"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2184917#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2182544" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2182544" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="gigiamorosa"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2149763"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2149763.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="gigiamorosa" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2182544ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2182544" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2149763">gigiamorosa</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-08">06/08/24 20:56</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I'm writing this with a heavy heart... I bought both Sweet Tooth and Caramel Dream, If you are anosmic (noseblind) to BR540, the chances of you detecting this fragrance are quite slim. As someone who can't detect BR540, I unfortunately, can't smell anything at all with these either. The packaging is incredibly cute though!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2182544"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2182544#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2179516" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2179516" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="anamawsity"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997817"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1997817.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="anamawsity" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2179516ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2179516" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1997817">anamawsity</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-05">06/05/24 21:16</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Not bad, but I much prefer the original Sweet Tooth. The patchouli is unfortunately just too much for me. It smells more like a light woody fragrance than a vanilla/caramel fragrance with hints of woodyness. It has minimal sillage and lasts about 6 hours. In terms of perfumes listed as similar<br />
 Oakcha Choco Break: similar but sharper and not as sweet<br />
 Al Rehab Choco Musk: no woodyness<br />
 Billies Eilish: has a strange grassy note on me<br />
 Kayali Vanilla Royale Sugared Patchouli: much more sharp and intense<br />
 Lattafa Eclaire: a honeyed caramel scent<br />
 Le Monde Gourmand Chai pic: lighter and missing the patchouli<br />
 Philosophy Fresh Cream Warm Cashmere: similar to the original Sweet Tooth, missing the woodyness<br />
 Sabrina Carpenter Sweet Tooth: much sweeter, missing the woodyness</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2179516"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2179516#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2175910" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2175910" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kelhil"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135046"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.2135046.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="kelhil" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Amore-Caffe-87409.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.87409.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Amore Caff"title="Amore Caff"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2175910ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2175910" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2135046">kelhil</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-06-02">06/02/24 14:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I wouldn't call this a caramel perfume, so if you would blind buy off that, I don't think it's safe to. I really, really love this fragrance, though. I had the original Sweet Tooth first and I love her, she's cute, but Caramel Dream is her more mature, slightly more decadent older sister. The chocolate note comes through a lot clearer on this one, but it's not in a way that's pinpointable AS chocolate, really. I don't get any citrus either, it just smells like a really warm, sweet, decadent gourmand to me. So cozy, it gives a very cookies fresh out of the oven smell. Some of this may be due to the patchouli, which I haven't historically been a fan of, but I love this scent. I've gotten compliments when I wear it. It also lacks lasting power, but usually gives me 6-7 hours, depending on humidity and temp of the day.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2175910"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2175910#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2173964" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2173964" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="ripgirl9000"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1625667"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1625667.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="ripgirl9000" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2173964ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2173964" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1625667">ripgirl9000</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-05-31">05/31/24 16:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Yummy Yummy Yummy. I smell chocolate and caramel with a spicy ginger / gingerbread note. Musk, almond and vanilla are there, but they are in the background. The dry down has a sweet smokiness as well.  Very delicious smelling and at such a good price! A perfect Fall or Winter scent. While Sabrina's OG Sweet Tooth leans sugar sweet and happy, Sweet Tooth Caramel Dream is heavier and better for cooler weather. I think this fragrance is less crowd pleasing that OG sweet tooth, but I find it more complex and elevated. Still deliciously sweet but the caramel / chocolate and spice make this gourmand perfect for date night!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2173964"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2173964#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2171234" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2147598"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2147598#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2139901" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2139901" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Scintillating_Jade"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1768607"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1768607.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Scintillating_Jade" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Chanel/Coco-Noir-15963.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.15963.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coco Noir"title="Coco Noir"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2139901ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2139901" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1768607">Scintillating_Jade</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-29">04/29/24 07:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is so delicious! It smells like fresh baked chocolate chip cookies with caramel dirzzle on top. If you enjoy sweet scents then you will love this. Sabrina did an amazing job with this fragrance and I actually prefer this one to the original sweet tooth perfume.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2139901"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2139901#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2130520" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2130520" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kaykay07"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2071724"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="kaykay07" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2130520ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2130520" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2071724">kaykay07</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-04-20">04/20/24 08:54</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Love love love! It's one of my signature scents. Spray 6-9 times then let it macerate for about a month and it'll be 10x stronger. It projects about 4 ft but it's not going to fill up the room, others smell it on me and i can smell it on myself. Lasts 5 hours (max 9 hours if I use the body spray with it, for me the body spray lasts long which is weird because body sprays NEVER last long on me especially B&amp;BW's sprays, I'm honestly so surpised with how long it lasts on me). If I do have to reapply I don't mind reapplying because it's SOOOO GOODDD! I've gotten compliements on this scent! The bottle is easy to take with on the go and reapply in the bathroom or car. But again, once you reapply it's going to last a good 5 hours. It's a very comforting gourmond scent. Think #1 Eilish by Biliie or a better version of warm vanilla sugar or fresh cream warm cashmere, it's within that dna but unique. Only con is the price, $30 for 1oz, so 3 oz would be $90, basically designer price, pray it becomes more affordable. The orginal sweet tooth is fresh cream warm cashmere to the t, this is more unique but has the same dna. Definetly would reccomend obv because it's now one of my signature scents. Make sure to let it sit for a month so it'll be 10x stronger!<br />
<br />
Quick edit: I read some other reviews and i don't know where they're getting the salted caramel. To me it's a cozy cozy scent. I have both the body spray and perfume and to me they both smell just so soft cozy warm and gourmond. Trust me you'll love.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2130520"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2130520#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2125820" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2125820" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Seens"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1707035"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1707035.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Seens" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Snif/Crumb-Couture-82624.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.82624.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Crumb Couture"title="Crumb Couture"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2125820ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2125820" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.84); It is quite complex and spicy.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2125820"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2125820#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2119714" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/2045288">Bijousmere</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-03-19">03/19/24 10:53</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>All I get is musk... I don't know why?!  I really wanted to like this.  But I should have known, when I tested the original Sweet Tooth it was WAY too musky for me.  Reminds me of Vanilla Fields or Vanilla Musk.  I can't get the smell out of my nose now.  So Walmart only had the OG to test.  I blind bought caramel dream, sprayed it in the parking lot and it's basically more of the same.  Extremely musky and just a hint of caramel.  RETURNING :(   I think if you LIKE musk and gourmands, you will like this.  For me, I should just steer clear of anything that has musk in it, because as soon as I detect it, that's all I can smell.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2097409"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2097409#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2076462" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It's like they use the same acidic woody base in perfumes now. I'll start collecting old perfumes as the new ones are disappointing. Fortunately there are many good dupes for discontinued oldies and I'm grateful for that.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2076462"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2076462#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2065449" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2065449" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="xenoarthropod"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1136536"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1136536.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="xenoarthropod" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Juliette-Has-A-Gun/Moon-Dance-27997.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.27997.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Moon Dance"title="Moon Dance"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2065449ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2065449" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1136536">xenoarthropod</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-17">02/17/24 15:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Aromachemical warning: "That Cloud smell"<br />
<br />
My daughter and I smelled the body spray in the store to be sure it was OK before getting the really cool looking bottle. We looked it up here and had our hopes up with these notes and many of the reviews. It would have only been $30. for that cool bottle at Walmart. I am so glad the lovely employee allowed us to smell the body spray first.<br />
<br />
Unfortunately, we couldn't smell the notes properly because it has the same lingering stuff in it that is in Ariana Grande Cloud, Sauvage, and also added into so many of the newer female frags and body sprays lately.<br />
 All we smell is that "Cloud smell" and not much of the sweet or chocolate notes. Daughter smelled no chocolate at all. <br />
<br />
Surely we can't be the only ones bothered by that scent in these perfumes. The reviewers saying that is smells masculine or like a men's cologne are probably smelling it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2065449"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2065449#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2058093" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.73);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2051707" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="BellicoseHoney"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930661"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1930661.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="BellicoseHoney" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Khamrah-75805.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.75805.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Khamrah"title="Khamrah"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2051707ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2051707" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1930661">BellicoseHoney</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-02-04">02/04/24 03:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Verry pretty and sweet. Starts out as pure sugar then dries down to a warm chocolate praline that sticks close to the skin. Not the best longevity but it makes up for it in affordability. Doesn't give the weird plastic vibe that some vanilla/sweet gourmands can pull on me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2051707"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2051707#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2046079" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2046079" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="veivet"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1822089"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1822089.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="veivet" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2046079ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2046079" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1822089">veivet</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-29">01/29/24 16:18</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>so tasty!! smells very very similar to the regular sweet tooth but more chocolatey and spicy. also, i loovee the packaging ^_^</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2046079"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2046079#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2041015" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2041015" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="yelrog"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958407"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1958407.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="yelrog" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Aquolina/Pink-Sugar-975.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.975.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Pink Sugar"title="Pink Sugar"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2041015ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2041015" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1958407">yelrog</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-24">01/24/24 17:29</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>So. Mfing. Tasty. <br />
I blind bought this today ($30 at Walmart, hell yeah!) and its SO GOOD. Literally smells like a caramel mocha. I dont get a single note of citrus or floral, its just pure sugar. I absolutely adore it though, and it pairs so nicely with my body lotion and the Posh Chocolate body wash from Lush. <br />
This goes BEYOND gourmand because there isnt anything besides sweetness in this scent (to me anyways) and it makes me smell edible. <br />
If you wanna smell edible, hit up your local Walmart!! You literally cant go wrong if you already know you like sweet smells.<br />
<br />
Edit: I have been reaching for this one over and over and over in the past few weeks. The longevity is crazy, especially on clothing. I have a jacket that I spritzed it on over a month ago now that STILL smells like it so heavily. It even lasts until the end of the day on my skin, which hardly ever happens because my skin just eats scents like nobody's business. The projection is medium, it gives you a nice little cloud but it won't choke out the person sitting next to you in a car. Honestly the best fragrance purchase I've made in a while, everything about this was pleasantly surprising.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2041015"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2041015#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2040717" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2040441"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2040441#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2040416" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2040416" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="oiprocs80"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1121763"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1121763.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="oiprocs80" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Calvin-Klein/Escape-271.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.271.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Escape"title="Escape"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2040416ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2040416" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1121763">oiprocs80</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-24">01/24/24 06:19</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smells edible, like Almond bark I use around Christmas time to make chocolate covered pretzels with. That's really all I smell after about 2 minutes of first spray except for a clean smell, like a very light white musk, clean skin. It doesn't last very long on me, 3 hrs tops and it sits close to my skin. I really like it though. Clean, light white musk and sweet almond bark...... mmmmm. I believe it is blended well because I can not pick out any one note. I will be layering this with my bbw warm vanilla sugar body butter.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2040416"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2040416#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2039097" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2039097" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="JoannaV22"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1592644"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1592644.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="JoannaV22" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2039097ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2039097" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1592644">JoannaV22</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-22">01/22/24 20:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I received this fragrance today and its such a cozy, comforting Vanilla scent. My favorite perfume of all time was Incredible Things by Taylor Swift and I would say that Sweet Tooth Caramel Dreams is the closet thing to a dupe that Ive found for it. They both share Vanilla, Orchid, Amber, and Musk notes with citrus openings. While Incredible Things has a more spicy opening, the dry downs are 90% the same to my nose. If anything, Caramel Dreams has a more complex dry down but I honestly thought of IT at first sniff. <br />
<br />
If you love sweet and gourmand scents, youll absolutely love this. Its sweet and flirty and Im super excited to add this into my rotation of perfumes.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2039097"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2039097#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2037397" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2037397" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="MysteriousMidna"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1725147"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1725147.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="MysteriousMidna" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Eclaire-93628.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93628.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eclaire"title="Eclaire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2037397ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2037397" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1725147">MysteriousMidna</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-21">01/21/24 07:31</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Main notes are sugar, vanilla, and slightly salty caramel. That might sound thick and heavy, but its still super light and cloudy, like its predecessor. The citrus, chocolate, and patchouli are noticeable but soft and subtle. The chocolate in this is a little stronger than in the OG. Unlike other reviewers, I don't get any coffee, spice, smoke, wax, cookies, or BO. This scent is often compared to Choco Musk but this is way better. For gourmand girlies like me, I think its still worth having this one and the original. I want this to perform a little bit better though, that's why it's a "like", not a "love". I know the cost is relatively low but if dupe companies like Oil Perfumery and Dua can make great fragrances with amazing performance and great prices, anyone can. Hopefully the performance improves over time, like some fragrances do.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2037397"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2037397#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2028664" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc2028664" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="1missvioletpurple"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764016"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1764016.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="1missvioletpurple" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Al-Haramain-Perfumes/Rawaa-51826.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.51826.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Rawaa"title="Rawaa"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma2028664ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd2028664" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1764016">1missvioletpurple</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2024-01-12">01/12/24 06:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This review is for the mist version. The initial spray is like Sugar Sky of VS Pink. Am a bit disappointed because the middle notes smells more manly due to the patchouli. Since the mist is light, I agree with the other reviews that it's best to layer this with choco musk to enhance the projection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="2028664"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=2028664#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent2026982" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1877295">Izzy_b_</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-12">12/12/23 16:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>(I have the body mist version) This fragrance starts off very masculine and almost cologne like. I can smell the patchouli and amber really strongly in the beginning which Im not a fan of. But when it settles down on the skin its a nice gourmand vanilla chocolate smell which I enjoy. I wish the opening wasnt so strong otherwise Id like this better but I still enjoy it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1999665"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1999665#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1998554" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; I can't find it anywhere...</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1998554"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1998554#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1996406" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:5,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1996406" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="LuckyDay27"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1245290"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1245290.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="LuckyDay27" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Estee-Lauder/White-Linen-542.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.542.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="White Linen"title="White Linen"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1996406ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1996406" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1245290">LuckyDay27</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-12-08">12/08/23 21:24</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Im enjoying this fragrance very much! The longevity is amazing for me: I put it kn at 7am this morning and its after 9pm now and I can still smell it as the yummy caramel base note! The caramel base note reminds me a lot of the caramel note jn Prada Candy. I can pick up the almond milk note in the beginning and I like it and I can also smell a lot of musk but its more in the middle than at the base. Its a great fragrance all around and especially appealing for fall and winter! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1996406"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1996406#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1991166" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It not good enough to call gourmands from my point of view. Caramel not outstanding.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1991166"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1991166#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1989268" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/869682">jxssicamidnight</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-30">11/30/23 15:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is incredible!<br />
Its the grown up sister of the original sweet tooth and I love it more than the original (which still is an amazing scent)<br />
<br />
To me this smells little reminiscent of Kayalis vanilla Royale sugared patchouli but without the oud and rum notes and less intense, which is perfect for me because I can only wear that one in winter!<br />
This one I can see working well for most seasons!<br />
Im getting a citrusy spiced caramel brle when wearing this <br />
<br />
Also layers beautifully with sweet tooth original, Bianco latte or vanilla 28. <br />
<br />
I am ordering myself a bigger bottle!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1989268"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1989268#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1989089" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/983272">PinkRainbow</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-30">11/30/23 11:52</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I liked the original Sweet Tooth so much that I took a chance and got the Caramel Dream version as a blind buy. Am I ever glad I did! This fragrance is absolutely incredible and, in my opinion, even surpasses the original. Perfectly blended  caramel, chocolate and almond-- with a subtle underlying smokiness that totally makes it work. Sweet orange and lemon make a beautiful slightly bitter backdrop.  I have been wearing it all day, and so far, the longevity and silage are wonderful too. Sabrina, if you ever want to go full time into the perfume business, you have got it made!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1989089"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1989089#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1982704" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.7);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It is a bit woodier than the original, and the citrus is a very strong on initial smell. I do like it, but I think for now I prefer the original sweet tooth.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1982704"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1982704#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1978811" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1978811" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="AuraAngelMuse"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1376206"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1376206.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="AuraAngelMuse" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1978811ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1978811" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.89); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1376206">AuraAngelMuse</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-17">11/17/23 09:26</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have the body spray. For me it smells the same as the OG Sweet Tooth. When I get the actual perfume I'll come back and update this post. The body spray smells like chocolate and vanilla with a super strong cashmere vibe. Like if you go to the scented wax section of Walmart and smell the Cashmere Amber wax, this scent smells really similar but with added chocolate and vanilla. The original Sweet Tooth has cashmere wood so it's probably in this one as well. Overall I like them both, but I'd probably rather buy the perfume over the body spray because it's not super strong or long lasting. The OG perfume lasts forever on my clothes and it's strong. Anyways I'll update if I buy the Caramel Dream EDP at some point.<br />
<br />
Also I think Choco Musk from Al Rehab is a cheaper alternative to Sweet Tooth and smells just as good. It lacks the intense cashmere vibe but it's chocolate-vanilla gourmand goodness in a bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1978811"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1978811#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1977617" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.89);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1819707">xeannie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-15">11/15/23 20:36</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>a delicious mix of chocolate and lemons! <br />
<br />
i got this and the original Sweet Tooth for my birthday and although i'm a bit disappointed with some of the notes, i must say that this is by far the best mix of chocolate with lemon. it's sweet and delectable - like a baked good! i think the top and heart notes are great, there's just one note that makes it smell so masculine and a bit dizzying - i guess, that's patchouli. still, a great addition in my collection but glad that i got the smaller bottle - will not repurchase!<br />
<br />
 lasts 2-3 hours<br />
 weak projection, skin scent<br />
 9/10 - creative bottle design but looks more ochre than chocolate brown<br />
<br />
pretty cool and unique chocolate scent, great to layer with Eilish no. 1! </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1977617"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1977617#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1968705" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1968705" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="noodlehead19"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1277444"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1277444.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="noodlehead19" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Mancera/Coco-Vanille-42782.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.42782.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Coco Vanille"title="Coco Vanille"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1968705ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1968705" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1277444">noodlehead19</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-11-04">11/04/23 15:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have both this and the OG, and honestly I think they're different enough to have both. this is like a deeper, darker caramel candy, tempered by the sandalwood &amp; patchouli. it's not as fluffy or marshmallowy, but it still has that sugary chocolate DNA with an added citrus twist in the opening that I actually quite like. the sweet part disappears kinda quickly, so that the not-so-sweet base notes last the longest, maybe ~6.5hrs, just a little longer than the original. I wore this to work the other day and my coworker told me I smelled like cookies, so I think that's a plus lol. if this really is limited edition, definitely snag it before it's gone.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex;
