<br />
Not for me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1968694"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1968694#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1964653" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1964653" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="allipt"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1879259"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="allipt" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1964653ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck0x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1964653" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1879259">allipt</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-30">10/30/23 17:25</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I had the regular Sweet Tooth, so I purchased the caramel dream version. I really wanted to like it, but it has an almost grandma smell, if that makes sense. The initial scent is very 'old lady,' almost like Chanel N5. The after scent smells more like caramel, but I was disappointed with this scent. It's not my taste, but if you like a scent like Chanel N5, this has a similar vibe, but more sweet.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1964653"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1964653#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1958336" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.78);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; It was a blind buy and the notes sounded wonderful,  but as you know sometimes when you get a fragrance it's still can be a miss. Well, luckily,  not with this perfume- it was a love at first spray! Beautiful,  cozy caramel  mixed with chocolate and almond accords. Very good projection and longevity. <br />
I find the bottle design quite unique and since it has a flat shape, it's easy to carry in a bag, especially if it's a 30 ml bottle.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; I was spraying it and thinking this smells familiar &amp; boom. It might just be the opening though.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1945571"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1945571#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1944117" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1944117" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Melba toast"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826334"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1826334.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Melba toast" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lush/Turmeric-Latte-Perfume-72229.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.72229.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Turmeric Latte Perfume"title="Turmeric Latte Perfume"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1944117ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1944117" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1826334">Melba toast</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-04">10/04/23 12:49</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was surprised by how much I like this perfume. It's just as lovely as some of my $100+ fragrances. My skin plays nicely with woody, spicy, incense-type notes, and this patchouli-sandalwood scent is no different. I am pleased it's not overly sweet and has just the right amount of cocoa/chocolate. There are notes of vanilla, too, but the vanilla takes a backseat the chocolate notes and is similar to BBW Warm Vanilla Sugar. On my skin, it reminds me of the chocolate filling in a homemade baked chocolate pie balanced by creamy sandalwood and herby patchouli. I don't get the caramel notes, but I think it works out better that way. If the caramel was stronger, this perfume would probably be too sweet for my tastes. The longevity is decent at the time of writing (going on 2+ hours and I still smell it), and if it turns out to last not much longer than that, at the $30 USD/1oz. price-point, I have no problem reapplying. I can see this fragrance being just right for late summer into fall and through winter, but I'll happily wear it year round.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1944117"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1944117#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1943100" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:1,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:3,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1943100" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="baekhyun"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1487403"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1487403.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="baekhyun" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Creed/Virgin-Island-Water-899.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.899.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Virgin Island Water"title="Virgin Island Water"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1943100ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck6x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1943100" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1487403">baekhyun</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-03">10/03/23 06:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>i was so worried about this because i love the original but i am nottttttttttttttttt a fan of patchouli or orange but!!!!! i barely smell the orange and the patchouli is the most wearable patchouli i've ever smelled. it's definitely THERE but rather than being omnipresent and overpowering the other notes, it hides in the background and adds some body to the caramel marshmallow sweetness. the almond milk also blends perfectly with the chocolate which is often (for me at least) a love or hate note in something. <br />
<br />
honestly it's exactly what a flanker should be, preserving the DNA of the original while carving its own identity on top of it. my only complaint has nothing to do with the perfume itself and just that my local walmarts all have their perfume section locked down like fort knox and no employees seem to know how to unlock it. i have to pathetically go ask around and annoy each worker for who has the keys like a sad little pauper locked out of his shanty. girl it's $29.99 let people steal it ive had ENOUGH!!!!!!!!!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1943100"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1943100#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1942556" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:4,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1942556" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Tessadawn"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703439"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1703439.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Tessadawn" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1942556ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1942556" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.85); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1703439">Tessadawn</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-10-02">10/02/23 11:39</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>When I tried the OG it went really weird cotton candy sickly sweet on me, I was pretty bummed cause I had heard alot of good things about it. So I was really curious about this one when I saw the notes. I tried it, but there was something off that I couldnt put my finger on so I set it aside for a month. I gotta say now it's REALLY growing on me. I def recommend spraying it then letting it sit for a month or so. If the og was too sweet for you and you like dark patchouli scents this might be for you. If you dont like patchouli stear clear lol I'm learning that patchouli really works well on me for whatever reason. When I put this on I get a really beautiful fudgy chocolate patchouli combo. I really don't get anything else anymore. I know alot of people love the citrus notes but those dissappear on me  I've had several men and women complement me when I wear this and it's one of my husband's favs on me. gormondy patchouli blends seem to be his fav in general lol its pretty unique for the price range it's in I haven't really smelled anything else like it at the drug store. For longevity I give it an 8 or a 9 it stays really well on my skin but forever on my cloths, hell I can still smell it on my seat belt weeks later lol for a cheapie blind buy it was def worth it.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1942556"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1942556#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1942500" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; Fortunately after some wear it dries to a woodsy slightly caramel scent reminiscent of the original without the bitter ginger note. I think it's great for fall weather. reminds me a bit of Eilish.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1942500"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1942500#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1939334" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.87);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1773135">seashelleyes</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-25">09/25/23 11:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Smelled the body spray first and it smelled amazing. The next time I went to Walmart, there was a tester out for this so I sprayed it and almost had to go wash my arm with how horrible it smelled. Like pine trees almost? It was incredibly masculine. Fortunately the scent was not strong for very long.<br />
<br />
However, its a few hours later now and when I smell my arm, it has dried down to a beautiful caramel skin scent, like how the body spray smelled. So at this point, I think Ill skip the EDP and go straight for the body spray. Such a strange experience.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1937029"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1937029#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1931268" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1931268" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="2000sgirlie"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1835617"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1835617.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="2000sgirlie" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.84095.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth Caramel Dream"title="Sweet Tooth Caramel Dream"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1931268ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1931268" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1835617">2000sgirlie</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-18">09/18/23 16:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>NGL, when I first got this about a month ago I was really let down. I love the previous Sweet Tooth and I love caramel so I thought it was gonna be love at first sniff. My first impression was a sharp and screechy orange and lemon mess mixed with the DNA of the OG.  Now a month later it's lost it's screechiness (thank god) and I actually smell caramel in the opening. I wouldn't say caramel is the star of this frag honestly. The amber, orange and lemon dominate this fragrance and blend really elegantly with the original sweet tooth DNA. It is still similar to the OG because they share the same DNA but I wouldn't guarantee that just because you like the original you would also like this. I prefer the original just because I'm a sweet lover and the caramel edition is more deep and citrusy which may speak to you if you wanted a more mature variant. <br />
<br />
So, after about a month I'm a fan. I'm not in love like I am with the OG but I still like this and it's perfect for fall. Let scents age before immediately throwing them out! I'm telling you sometimes It just takes a couple of weeks for the scent to evolve.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1931268"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1931268#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1930390" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1930390" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="fruity_iykwim"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761110"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1761110.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="fruity_iykwim" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Fine-ry/Without-A-Trace-91430.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.91430.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Without A Trace"title="Without A Trace"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1930390ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1930390" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1761110">fruity_iykwim</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-17">09/17/23 13:38</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I was sooo disappointed, this is going right back to walmart :( I didn't see anyone on tik tok say the patchouli was strong, but to me it definitely is. it's honestly somewhat in the realm of angel to me - super gourmand with lots of patchouli. as someone who doesn't like patchouli, it just smells like someone dipped their sundae in dirt lmao.<br />
<br />
caramel and dark chocolate are the only other notes I smell. for me, it's a headache, but if these notes are up your alley you'll probably like it! I was just looking for a pure gourmand.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1930390"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1930390#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1929059" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1929059" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Pinkcosmos15"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283795"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Pinkcosmos15" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Paris-Hilton/Electrify-57357.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.57357.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Electrify"title="Electrify"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1929059ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1929059" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.71); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1283795">Pinkcosmos15</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-15">09/15/23 22:41</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To be honest, it really does smell like the original, but this one has a very strong presence of patchouli. So if youre not a fan of patchouli then maybe you wont like it. But if you do like patchouli then this one is for you! And I do appreciate the strong scent of patchouli and on the dry down I get a light caramel fade. So overall, this fragrance is very similar to the original, but this one smells a lot more fall ready and mature girl, thats ready to be an adult and smell not so girly girl.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1929059"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1929059#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1927162" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:1,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1927162" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Blxkchai"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1704668"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1704668.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="Blxkchai" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Vivamor-Parfums/Vanilla-Vice-88703.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.88703.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Vanilla Vice"title="Vanilla Vice"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1927162ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck1x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1927162" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1704668">Blxkchai</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-13">09/13/23 14:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The dry down reminds me of Mixbar Vanilla Bourbon!! STCD opens sweet with a nice milk chocolate sweetness, and dries down to a nice caramel dipped patchouli musk. VB dries a bit sweeter but I can hardly detect the difference in the dry down. You may not need both in your collection.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1927162"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1927162#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1925146" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:2,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="2"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1925146" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="midgetfingerz@gmail.com"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1833355"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1833355.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="midgetfingerz@gmail.com" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1925146ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1925146" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.82); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1833355"><a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="234e4a47444657454a4d4446515963444e424a4f0d404c4e">[email&#160;protected]</a></b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-11">09/11/23 06:43</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I guess my nose is broken, because ALL I smell is patchouli!<br />
I can't get past it.<br />
I sprayed this on my wrist and instantly, before even raising my wrist, could tell I didn't like it. <br />
I had my 17 year old smell it and she also said she couldn't smell anything sweet.<br />
Maybe it's the bottle I got? <br />
I keep seeing people say it's similar to the original with more "depth" but I don't get ANY of the original in this one</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1925146"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1925146#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1923706" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1923706" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="drugstore classics"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/274586"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="drugstore classics" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1923706ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1923706" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(249,249,243,0.83); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/274586">drugstore classics</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-09">09/09/23 11:00</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>The body spray lacks power and sillage, but is a very pretty scent in the same category as Black Sugar, its dupes, and Eilish and its dupes.  Maltitol and adorable packaging should guarantee good sales. <br />
<br />
Update:<br />
I wrote an uncomplimentary review and today had to revise my thoughts on the 10 USD dollar spray I sampled at Walmart the other day.  WHY?<br />
<br />
&lt;3 Because today I popped into BBW, and to my great surprise nothing they had there in the vanilla-ish category was anywhere near as appealing.   <br />
<br />
&lt;3 Because I was wrong about sillage - my family happily smelled this far better than I'd thought.<br />
<br />
&lt;3 Because it lasted on my skin for over 8 hours!!!!<br />
<br />
<br />
<br />
Yes, my initial impression was rather off.  I still prefer less expensive Maltitol edp without the huge alcohol opening of a body spray.  But this IS good value in wear time and IS a real compliment getter and IS quite huggable. Win-win-win!<br />
<br />
Just a note:  If you enjoy that maltitol base but with a totally different twist, try out Body Fantasies POMEGRANATE scent also.  It's tart, fruit candy in the opening but rapidly becomes lovely and strong with comparable sillage and longevity.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1923706"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1923706#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1918631" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.8);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1481957">Perfumeaddict84</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-02">09/02/23 22:10</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I got the perfume today and already had the body mist the original is milk chocolate and marshmallows and has a fluffiness about it, this one is dark chocolate and has a rich quality, I love the originalbut I love this one as well they dont smell alike.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1918381"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1918381#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1918265" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1918265" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="karobi"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1381142"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1381142.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="karobi" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Lattafa-Perfumes/Eclaire-93628.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.93628.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Eclaire"title="Eclaire"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1918265ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1918265" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1381142">karobi</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-09-02">09/02/23 19:08</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I will start by saying I have not smelled the original Sweet Tooth fragrance, but when I saw just one of these left on the shelf of my Walmart, I had to grab it and see what the fuss was about.<br />
<br />
Damn, its good. Very gooey and gourmand. It has a very prominent lemon/citrus top note, which IMO sets this apart from other gourmands in my collection. I dont get a bitter dark chocolate from this, but rather a milky, dense and rich milk chocolate with warm caramel at the base. And lots of sandalwood for added creaminess and depth. I get a little patchouli which just adds a little bit of chocolatey-ness to the base for me.<br />
<br />
To my nose, this smells almost exactly like the new Victorias Secret Autumn Shore body mist, which I also picked up recently, with an added lemon note. It has the same sweet smokiness that some would describe as masculine. But it also has an almost Cloud-esque airiness to it as well.<br />
<br />
Im excited to use this for the fall season and later it with that body spray! This is a win of a blind buy for me!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1918265"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1918265#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1917306" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1917306" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="mariboo"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1457560"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1457560.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="mariboo" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1917306ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1917306" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.82); Great recipe for a gourmand!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1917306"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1917306#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1916519" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1916519" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="lulugal11"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/990244"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.990244.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="lulugal11" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Cherry-Baby-95861.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.95861.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby"title="Sweet Tooth Cherry Baby"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1916519ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1916519" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(247,244,242,0.9); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/990244">lulugal11</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-31">08/31/23 16:28</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Something in the drydown reminds me of Bijan for men.  I had the original pink version which smelled like a creamy marshmallow. This smells like someone who wore Bijan all day and is now eating a marshmallow.  I love rhis scent and it gets better as time goes by.<br />
It is warm and powdery chocolate marshmallow goodness and is a very non-threatening scent. I think this could be pleasant on most people as it does lean a bit unisex to me.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1916519"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1916519#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1915218" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1447944">SELFCARE_INTROVERT</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-30">08/30/23 07:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Sweet; Woodsy and Mens Cologne as someone stated down below. Its not as sweet as the OG but still a nice scent for Fall &amp; Winter. Its not that Heavy on Caramel to Me but its nice.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1915218"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1915218#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1914614" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:3,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:1,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="3"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1914614" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="FreeBeing"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1282411"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1282411.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="FreeBeing" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-76824.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.76824.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Sweet Tooth"title="Sweet Tooth"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1914614ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1914614" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.77); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1282411">FreeBeing</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-29">08/29/23 14:13</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I have the original and this one. I prefer the original which is sweeter and more noticeable on my skin. Comparing the two, I find the OG to be a deep milk chocolate while the Caramel is trying to be a dark chocolate and failing. The patchouli gets in the way for me. I can layer it with something like Fancy and make it work but... I prefer the OG.<br />
<br />
It's funny that every one of the "People who like this..." fragrances are my favorites.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1914614"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1914614#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1914521" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1914521" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="cyclone1391"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/666114"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.666114.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="cyclone1391" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1914521ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1914521" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,247,236,0.81); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/666114">cyclone1391</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-29">08/29/23 11:57</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>This is a very pleasant surprise for me, I'm really enjoying it! Not nearly as heavy and gourmand as you'd expect. Patchouli is definitely noticeable but the most wearable patchouli I've ever experienced. The opening has a less spicy Lira vibe but that quickly fades, I wish that lasted longer. It's a much more "grown" smelling fragrance despite its packaging and price point. Performance is poor to mediocre which is the only flaw. <br />
<br />
Update: strange to me that so many think this smells like the original. I went out and bought the original because I liked this so much and they are very different on my skin. Original is an almost entirely linear, powdered sugar marshmallow that smells very typical girly, celebrity, body mist. Caramel dream is patchouli, cacao, vanilla, sandalwood and caramel on my skin. Body chemistry I guess.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1914521"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1914521#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1913714" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.83);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:1,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="1"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1912802" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="Leelee00"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1452913"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/himg/o.69247.png" class="comments-avatar"alt="Leelee00" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/d-Annam/White-Rice-89243.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.89243.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="White Rice"title="White Rice"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1912802ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1912802" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.87); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1452913">Leelee00</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-27">08/27/23 11:17</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>Heavy on the caramel but eventually dries down to the OG plus sandalwood or more specially the OG mixed with men's cologne. <br />
<br />
Maybe because I've had my nose in gourmands all year but this is definitely masculine. Sandalwood specifically does not have to lean masculine but for whatever reason this particular flanker does. <br />
<br />
I prefer the OG.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1912802"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1912802#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1912740" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1912740" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="doubler"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371481"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1371481.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="doubler" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1912740ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck4x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1912740" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.79); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1371481">doubler</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-27">08/27/23 09:35</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>as someone who wears the original sweet tooth almost every day, i rushed to buy this as soon as my walmart had it stocked. no regrets!<br />
<br />
sweet tooth caramel dream, to my nose, is very similar to the OG upon initial spray. its a tad more chocolatey and you get a little less marshmallow.  the biggest difference, as others have mentioned, is in the dry-down.  the sandalwood gives this flanker a really nice edge.<br />
<br />
if youre a fan of sweet tooth, its definitely worth a try! :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1912740"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1912740#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1912034" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;had&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1912034" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="vibrant.girl"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1543118"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1543118.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="vibrant.girl" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Glossier/You-Doux-97605.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.97605.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="You Doux"title="You Doux"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1912034ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x1"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1912034" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.84); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1543118">vibrant.girl</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-26">08/26/23 10:06</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>To my nose, this is a reference to Angel Muse - earthy chocolate with some sweetness and a rich patchouli. This smells a lot more expensive than it is, and it's a more refined and 'unisex' blend than the OG Sweet Tooth. I prefer this because it lasts better and is less powdery... I think this is like if Angel Muse and TF Tobacco Vanille had a baby. I love it :)</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1912034"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1912034#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1910651" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:0,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:null}"></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1910651" class="cell small-2" ><div ><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="emeraldwaters"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1286019"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1286019.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="emeraldwaters" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1910651ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1910651" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"><div class="flex-child-shrink" style="background: rgba(250,245,242,0.76); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1286019">emeraldwaters</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-24">08/24/23 15:55</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>yallll this is like vanilla royale but w no oud!! and the patchouli isnt AS strong as VR but its definitely still present. it has the sweet tooth gooey marshmallowy dna but with a sprinkle of cocoa and some orange zest that reminds me a hint of orchidee vanille. sabrina carpenter u have done it again! constantly raising the bar for us all and doing it flawlessly </p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; It is so similar to intoxicated with a little more of a chocolatey vibe. Sandalwood heavy, with just a touch of the original sweet tooth dna. This smells much more expensive than it is, but unfortunately, fleeting.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1910401"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1910401#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1909824" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(248,249,236,0.71);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:0,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:0,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:0,&quot;sillage&quot;:0,&quot;gender&quot;:null,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1908899" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="blackcat02"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448371"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1448371.jpg" class="comments-avatar"alt="blackcat02" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Ariana-Grande/Ari-31661.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.31661.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Ari"title="Ari"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1908899ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck2x2"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1908899" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(250,249,251,0.78); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1448371">blackcat02</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-22">08/22/23 15:47</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I made a trip to Walmart for this. I hate Walmart and only go once in a blue moon so I really really wanted to try this. <br />
Its less sweet than I anticipated but still excellent. The patchouli is strong in this and its the first thing I smell. So is the lemon and strongly resembles Akros Awake. Lemon is their only shared note but I cant shake away from the comparison. I decluttered Awake a few months ago but this instantly brought me back. <br />
Imo this leans more feminine but not so much to where its extremely overly feminine. <br />
Update: Ive been wearing this for a few days and the vanilla really comes out as the perfume is fading away on skin. Ive been putting this on before bed and wake up wondering what smells so good when I wake up in the morning. It smells just like vanilla soft serve ice cream. Woke up today craving vanilla soft serve lol. At first spray, I pick up lemon, dark chocolate, a little caramel, and patchouli. So it is very sweet, but in a different way than the original.<br />
11/27/23 update:<br />
This smells like a Wendys vanilla frosty which I enjoy from time to time, but it totally cheapens the entire experience of wearing this. Im not at all trying to say Im too good for Wendys, I just dont necessarily want to smell like a frosty. The resemblance is uncanny to me. I wish I could still smell the dark chocolate caramel.</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1908899"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1908899#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1904820" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:4,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:0,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:1,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:1,&quot;longevity&quot;:2,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female_unisex&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="4"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%; padding-top: 0.4rem; padding-bottom: 0.4rem;"><div id="cc1904820" class="cell small-2" sticky-container><div v-sticky><div class="comments-avatar" style="position: relative;" itemprop="author" itemtype="http://schema.org/Person" itemscope><meta itemprop="name" content="kawaiithugg"/><span class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796535"><img loading="lazy" itemprop="image" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/avatari/m.1796535.gif" class="comments-avatar"alt="kawaiithugg" style="opacity: 0.85;"></span><div class="perfume-wearing-avatar"><span class="idLinkify" title="/perfume/Vera-Wang/Princess-1596.html"><img loading="lazy" src="https://fimgs.net/mdimg/perfume/mm.1596.jpg"class="perfume-wearing-icon" alt="Princess"title="Princess"></span></div><div class="karma-avatar-new"><div id="karma1904820ckNxM" class="ckNxM ck3x3"></div></div></div></div></div><div id="dd1904820" class="cell small-10 flex-container flex-dir-column"sticky-container><div class="flex-child-shrink" v-sticky style="background: rgba(255,253,234,0.75); padding: 0.2rem;"><p><b class="idLinkify" title="https://www.fragrantica.com/member/1796535">kawaiithugg</b><span class="vote-button-legend" style="padding: 0 1rem;" itemprop="datePublished" content="2023-08-17">08/17/23 18:02</span></p></div><div class="flex-child-auto" style="position: relative;"><div v-pre itemprop="reviewBody"><p>I saw it the other day at Walmart but had to wait until pay day today (along with Billie Eilish's perfume that I really wanted but it was gone ) and luckily there was one left! There was 4 originally so 3 people already snag it up within a day. <br />
I have the original and it's very similar to it, but the moods are definitely different. Like comfy vs going out type vibes, where Caramel Dream is definitely going out. <br />
I do agree with the comment below that it's leaning more towards a masculine scent and I'm assuming it could be that patchouli/sandalwood. <br />
I usually hate patchouli but it's not so bad with this scent, which makes me more optimistic about the note. <br />
Overall I think it's worth it for the price point, you could technically have both in your collection still cheaper than most perfumes!</p></div></div><div class="flex-child-shrink"><div style="display:flex; align-items: baseline;"><vote-buttons initial_status="neutral" item_id="84095"comment_id="1904820"vote_for="perfumeReview"></vote-buttons><share path="/perfume/Sabrina-Carpenter/Sweet-Tooth-Caramel-Dream-84095.html?ccid=1904820#focus-zone"></share></div></div></div></div></div><div id="parent1904314" class="cell fragrance-review-box" style="background: rgba(254,252,238,0.86);" itemprop="review" itemtype="http://schema.org/Review" itemscope><div style="display: flex;flex-wrap: wrap;justify-content: end;position: relative"><user-perfume-votes :perfume-votes="{&quot;rating&quot;:5,&quot;winter&quot;:1,&quot;spring&quot;:1,&quot;summer&quot;:0,&quot;autumn&quot;:0,&quot;day&quot;:1,&quot;night&quot;:0,&quot;longevity&quot;:3,&quot;sillage&quot;:2,&quot;gender&quot;:&quot;female&quot;,&quot;relation&quot;:&quot;have&quot;}"><div itemprop="reviewRating" itemtype="http://schema.org/Rating" itemscope><meta itemprop="ratingValue" content="5"/><meta itemprop="bestRating" content="5"/></div></user-perfume-votes></div><div class="grid-x" style="width 100%;
